nodes.text: The SD-60 Personal Defense Droid was a model of bipedal battle droid used by the the Shroud, a freelance spy active during the Galactic War. SD-60 Personal Defense Droids were among the droid forces that defended the Shroud's factory on the moon Nar Shaddaa.

SD-60 Personal Defense Droids appear as enemies in the final macrobinoculars mission—"The Shroud Revealed" for Republic players and "All the Pieces" for Imperials— in Rise of the Hutt Cartel, the first Digital Expansion for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
